definition: whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 問題是無論如何對閱讀的這種關注比圖片根由影響。

sentences.english: Still, the results are encouraging, opening a new pathway of study.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，結果還是喜人的，並打開一條研究的新路。

sentences.english: In any event, protecting yourself against such a case is relatively easy.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，防止自己攤上這種官司相對比較容易。

sentences.english: It's by no means causative of the skyline of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何也不可能決定巴黎的建築。

sentences.english: No, I could never agree to sign this contract.
sentences.chinese: 不，我無論如何也不會籤這份合同。

sentences.english: At any rate, woman has no soul---what is there to know about her?
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，女人沒有靈魂，她還有什麼將被瞭解？

sentences.english: Anyway, then I left Harbin and moved to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，後來我離開了哈爾濱，搬到了北京。

sentences.english: Anyway, thank you for all your time.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，我非常感謝你的幫忙。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, he was looking out along the Ecliptic, in that general direction.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，它正在沿黃道面朝那個大致方向望出去。

sentences.english: Information is information as far as it goes.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何信息永遠只是信息。

sentences.english: But nevertheless, the people expect us to work together.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，人民希望我們戮力同心。
無論如何強調都不爲過。

sentences.english: When running outdoors, you have to get back to your start destination somehow!
sentences.chinese: 戶外跑的時候，無論如何你必須回到你的起點。

sentences.english: "It's my turn to sit by the window, anyhow, " said Flossie .
sentences.chinese: “無論如何，現在該輪到我坐在窗邊了，”弗洛西說。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
